title: Augmented Reality Wearable-Based Food Safety Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic food safety theory and comprehension of hygiene management protocols
context.additional_context: Practical education integrating data analysis and decision-making processes for food safety management, designed for mathematics majors.

learning_goals: Learners can perform food safety procedures from a first-person perspective using augmented reality wearables with 90% accuracy
Learners analyze hygiene management failure cases in a simulated environment and produce risk factor identification reports at least three times
Learners demonstrate their commitment to changing food safety behaviors by scoring at least 85 points on VR-based formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
